ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Suggestions for a Level 30
ygData.msgSnippet: That is somewhat true... Lotsa SS out there, lots of it belongs to warriors and stuff that think cobalt is an even trade for (haha right!)  So i keep to myself
ygData.messageBody:
That is somewhat true... Lotsa SS out there, lots of it belongs to warriors
and stuff that think cobalt is an even trade for (haha right!) So i keep to
myself quiet... Got free ss boots a while back from a friend. Got a free SS
helm other night from some friends who just came out of seb. And 2 nights
ago i get a few people asking me about bards in guildchat, one was asking me
what i was using because he wanted to "twink" his level 30 bard (ok at least
its not a lev 4). And then a good buddie sends me a tell right afterwards
asking me if i had my ss gloves, i told him thats why im hunting in karnors
at 41. Soooo next time i see his chanter i get a free set of ss gloves.

Another question: what are people using as a cloak? (other then cloak of
flames)
I got a kunzar cloak last night (hey i was using bronze) and was wondering
if i should ask my buddy to trade me his lizzie cloak, or should i try to
buy a better cloak, if so which?

Minkin
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: October 25, 2000 10:13 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Suggestions for a Level 30


Hahah Correction! The bard only ones tend to be ninja looted by fellow
guild members to put in the "bank" (i.e. their level 4 bard twink who they
can't play worth crap but want to equip). I've seen lots o singing steel
disappear this way too but now am keeping track!

On a sad note, Tani is all of a sudden dying in 30 :( Died twice *pouts*...
those mobs in Frontier Mountains are MEAN!

Thanks for the advice on weapons :) I'll work my way towards those!

Halana, 57th !!!!!!!!!!!! Shaman
Tani, 30th Bardette

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 25, 2000 8:09 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Suggestions for a Level 30
>
>
> Tani,
>
> Sounds like you have some nice weapons there. The spine I am
> not familiar
> with, the Walking Stick I have and use because I like the
> effect message:
> 'somemob01 glances nervously about' (tashan). The 'claw
> thing' sounds like
> Sainey's Claw which I also have and use because it adds 10
> AC. Some next
> step bard weaps are: Sionache's Partisan 9/19 piercing,
> Symphonic Saber 11
> 23 with the effect that lowers you on the hate list. Jade
> mace 9 18 is good
> too but maybe a bit harder to get as they are usable by other classes.
> Harmonic Dagger is 10 21 - awesome. breath of Harmony 10 18
> effect: Niv's
> Preservation - uber.
>
> All of these weps are normally obtain by level 50+ groups in
> the Kunark
> Dungeons. The bard only ones tend to get traded off or passed down.
>
> Sylly
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
